member.name: T:SimpleKit.WindowsRuntime.UI.Input.RelayCommand
member.summary: A basic implementation of the ICommand interface.

member.name: T:SimpleKit.WindowsRuntime.UI.Input.ExecuteDelegate
member.summary: A delegate for a command's Execute method, which takes a parameter and doesn't return a value.

member.name: T:SimpleKit.WindowsRuntime.UI.Input.CanExecuteDelegate
member.summary: A delegate for a command's CanExecute method, which takes a parameter and returns a value.
member.returns: **true** if the command can execute; **false** otherwise.
